pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, April 13, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

 Vancouver, British Columbia

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister and Minister of National Defence Harjit Sajjan will deliver remarks at the Khalsa Diwan Society’s Ross Street Gurdwara.

Khalsa Diwan Society’s Ross Street Gurdwara
8000 Ross Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:00 a.m.

 

12:45 p.m. The Prime Minister and Minister of National Defence Harjit Sajjan will participate in the Vancouver Vaisakhi Parade.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage  
  • Media are asked to arrive to the Chevron gas station at the corner of Main Street and South East Marine Drive no later than 12:00 p.m.

 
1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the Vancouver Vaisakhi Parade. Minister of National Defence Harjit Sajjan will be in attendance.

Punjabi Market Stage
Main Street and 50th Avenue

Note for media:

  • Open coverage
